subject: World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Quade Cooper of Australia has been branded public enemy No. 1 by fans in New Zealand and criticized for his play by others, but he sees no reason to change his style.
snippet: Quade Cooper of Australia has been branded public enemy No. 1 by fans in New Zealand and criticized for his play by others, but he sees no reason to change his style.
